title: Domain of log functions
text: The domain of the log function $$f(x)=\log_{a}\left(x\right)$$ is $$(0,\infty)$$.

title: Transformations
text: $$f(x)=\log_{2}\left(x+3\right)$$ translates the parent function $$f(x)=\log_{2}\left(x\right)$$ 3 units to the left. How does this affect the domain?
